name: ItsTechNicole
text: ***Update: This location has changed quite a bit in the last few years. The customer service was better before, now it's kinda blah. They are often out of products (like wings) so if you want them don't count on getting them. Also, not ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela Christmas
text: After a string of bad experiences here I decided to go back. There's been a real turnaround here in service. When I order online, my pizza is always ready on time and is piping hot. The staff is very friendly and courteous.

name: L. B.
text: When using a pizza coupon to order pizza, don't expect anything more than cheese bread. The ingredients are only about 1/4  c. each...not enough for a large pizza. Very sparse. You get only cheese bread for a pizza price. Not worth it. Will not do again.

name: April & Blake Cazes
text: They were ridiculous! I ordered 2 large pizzas online at 7:15. It said they would be ready in 15 mins. I waited 15 mins before I even left my house & then when I got there the manager rang me up & told me it would be a few mins. I waited in ‚Ä¶More

name: Lacie Czop
text: This is beyond ridiculous I am still currently waiting for two hours now for my order so I call up there and they tell me my pizza is late well that is obvious to give them another 15 min. im not too happy .

name: Brandy Massarotti
text: AVOID AT ALL COSTS! An hour and a half after ordering online, the website still says they're preparing my order, and no one is answering the phone.  I just spent 10 minutes on hold and never spoke to a soul.  If you're hungry, call Domino's.

name: Latisha Daigre
text: I wish I could give them a negative star. This is the WORST Pizza Hut. I ordered online for delivery after an hour I tried calling, Of course no answer. Two hours later the delivery guy show up with ice cold pizza and bread knots. This is not the first or second time! I'm done with this place. They need new stuff!!!üò°üò°üò°üò°

name: Jon Snow
text: Terrible service. Long wait . Always get our food wrong. Manager was rude to me after I asked her to remake food that was wrong. Don't go there...

name: Donald Jones
text: It totally sukd order a personal pan pizza 4 only had 2 out other was frozen said would be ready till 12 and got there had to put two pizza back in oven was cooked all the way and finally got pizza at 12:15 going get pizza elsewhere Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Teresa Wilson
text: Food was delicious - especially the rib eye (bone in) and the mussels. The flatbread pizza was very tasty and so were the complimentary rolls. Cozy atmosphere and great service. All around - a very nice dining experience.

name: Kevin Dore
text: I actually live closer to a different Pizza hut but I go out of my way to get food from here because the service is so much better and I never have a problem with my order being wrong. The employees here seen to care about their customers ‚Ä¶More

name: katelyn Loupe
text: This place needs to be shut down. It has the worst service on the planet.

name: Angenella Haughton
text: Always hot and very good. Service a little slow but they were busy so I understand.

name: Miranda F
text: First time I ordered I ended up having to call after waiting almost an hour and a half for a delivery, they then told me I had to come pick it up (asked if I still wanted it, now been told this happens often) after getting it home it was ‚Ä¶More

text: They are good but the restaurant needs work it's dirty snd looks like it hasn't be cleaned in months.

name: Rachel Armstrong Askins
text: Food was hot and delicious. Staff was pleasant

name: Kimberly Stewart
text: I ordered delivery. After 2 hours of waiting and calling,  the driver called and said he was just arriving at the store to pick up the food.  After another 35 mins, he finally arrived. Food wasn't right and it was cold.  Worst experience ever.

text: It's pizza hut, things go good and bad. It's a flip of a coin

text: Wow! This was our first time to Zahav and it will not be out last. Just awesome! Up there as one of the best in the country!!!

text: The worst service ever. And the one employee at the register was nothing but horrible. Will not be going back.......

name: Jada Brielle
text: I love this Pizza Hut. My favorite crust is the thin and crispy. Less bread, more flavor. Not too much bread or greasy like the pan crust. I've going here for years and I have hardly ever had a negative experience. When I did once or twice, ‚Ä¶More

text: Switched to Dominos Pizza bc Pizza Hut  almost never has delivery drivers, and when they do, the wait time is 1hr +. Good food, of course, but delivery needs much improvement.
